name: Assessment
description: The Assessment class describes the technical and non-technical repercussions of the incident on the CSIRT's constituency.

Impact.name: Impact
Impact.description: Technical impact of the incident on a network.

TimeImpact.name: TimeImpact
TimeImpact.description: Impact of the activity measured with respect to time.

MonetaryImpact.name: MonetaryImpact
MonetaryImpact.description: Impact of the activity measured with respect to financial loss.

Counter.name: Counter
Counter.description: A counter with which to summarize the magnitude of the activity.

Confidence.name: Confidence
Confidence.description: An estimate of confidence in the assessment.

AdditionalData.name: AdditionalData
AdditionalData.description: A mechanism by which to extend the data model.

occurrence.name: occurrence
occurrence.description: Specifies whether the assessment is describing actual or potential outcomes.  The default is "actual" and is assumed if not specified.

restriction.name: restriction
restriction.description: This attribute is defined in Section 3.2.
